website_summaries.verdict: The 14-inch Acer Swift 3 is a well-rounded ultraportable laptop at a moderate price, with solid port selection and strong battery life that offset a merely average screen.
pros: Perky performance from Core i5 CPU and PCIe SSD
cons: Shallow keyboard with small, crowded cursor control keys

customer_reviews.title: Great little number
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my GF - she absolutely loves it as an upgrade from her old and well used Mac book pro. It’s very fast, has a nice suite of features and is perfect for everyday use. Lightweight, decent battery, good audio video quality etc. My only complaint is that the screen has some bleeding of backlight around the edges but this is minor and only visible when the background is very dark/Black... it’d drive me insane but the missus doesn’t mind it. I recommend this laptop as a solid choice you’ll struggle to go wrong with.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: super sleek and really good battery life
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this laptop at all. I have had it for a couple of months now and have used it for both work, social and playing sims4 with no issues. I was most impressed by the battery life, the battery gets me through a full day of work without any need to charge. It does go down faster when you're running more demanding programs but still not bad at all. It looks nice and sleek, it's pretty thin too but also a good screen size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, screen, slim, fast and works well. Good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop, rubbish fingerprint scanner
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this laptop which is light in weight and stylish. Does all I need it to do. The fingerprint scanner is really temperamental though. I've tried loads of different approaches - warm finger, quick jab, long slow pressure - the response seems random, sometimes it works but 3 times out of 4 it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Rosietoes

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this computer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this computer. It is fast and, having dropped it twice (once on the open screen on to a hard surface) I can confirm that it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Problem with laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop just over 2 mouths and it wouldn't turn on as of lately so I took to a repair shop and it started smoking after 5-10minutes
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gerard A Daly

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Battery failed after 2 days. Amazon support was very poor and it took 2 weeks to get a refund. Time and money wasted. I will not trust an Acer product again
customer_reviews.author: cd100

customer_reviews.title: Acer Laptop Swift 3
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Acer laptop Swift 3 I have bought. The first one failed after a week of use. The power button ceased to work. I had to pack it up and return it to the supplier which was very inconvenient but I got a full refund fairly promptly. The second one is working well and I like its lightweight and clear keyboard. Fingers crossed this one won't be faulty.. .
customer_reviews.author: M. E. MOODY

customer_reviews.title: Smooth to look at and operate
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward. Battery very good. I do not uses fingerprint readers as wizzened fingers! I also prefer not to use a touch screen but a separate Logi pad. My preferences at this stage as my first notebook rather than a desk model. Its is great to have it taking up less space.
customer_reviews.author: clementina

customer_reviews.title: Good Resolution
customer_reviews.text: Screen size smaller than expected, but down to my own spacial awareness. Fast processing. Overall pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: llamedos

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and value price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing to dislike is the fingerprint reader which operates intermittently. The screen quality and image is very good and the processing speed is quick.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Watson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good laptop. I purchased it with the intention for work, so I opted for a faster processor instead of a graphics card. It's sleek, has fantastic battery life and the ips screen allows for viewing from almost any angle. I also got it on Prime day, so it was discounted quite nicely. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: be careful

customer_reviews.title: Brand New Machine with faulty audio equipment
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my daughter in Colombia. We took it out to her and on returning she tells us it is faulty, the microphone does not work so she is unable to Skype us or any of her friends and family. Are these machines not checked?

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant laptop
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this laptop's appearance, layout & speed. Plus, the backlit keyboard & anti glare screen are an added bonus.

customer_reviews.title: Looks aren't everything.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for general use to replace a 5 year old HP laptop. Looks great with a crystal clear display. However it is ridiculously slow, slower than the HP that it replaced, struggled to maintain connection, was unable to transfer documents accurately to OneDrive and has a fingerprint scanner that works occasionally! Returned after one day!
